title: Who was your 'gateway drug' into K-pop? - Quora

response.answer_text: KDramas. Specifically, Boys Over Flowers. It featured SHINee & SS501 in the OSTs, & Kim Hyun Joong (leader of SS501) was the second lead (and SHOULD have gotten the girl). He sang Because I’m Stupid (acoustic version) in the drama and I just fell very very hard. This led to me checking out those groups, I saw SHINee’s Lucifer performed in an SMTown YouTube concert video, and the rest just is history.
